content.question: MetroRail Station 2015 2018 Spring Hill 1,406 1,203 Greensboro 1,071 1,265 Tysons Corner 3,141 3,480 McLean 1,669 1,830 Total 7,287 7,778 The map shows major highways and the route of the Metrorail Silver Line around Tysons Corner, Virginia, an edge city outside of Washington, D.C. Using the information in the map and the data table, which of the following was the most likely positive result of the opening of the Metrorail Silver Line in 2014 ?

choices.label: More vehicular traffic on the 495 Capital Beltway and 287 Toll Road
More vehicular traffic on Chain Bridge Road and Leesburg Pike
An increase in population and business activity as a result of improved connectivity
A decrease in population and business activity as a result of changing demographics
A decrease in the number of shoppers at the Tysons Corner shopping malls

content.answer: An increase in population and business activity as a result of improved connectivity

unit.text: 6: Cities and Urban Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in maps and in quantitative and geospatial data to draw conclusions.
